Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ecPis-4 (piscidins, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 41.6% similarity toPis1.  molecular formula:  C124H187N38O25; Mol Wt 2609.073; GRAVY=  -0.418; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide:  -0.17  kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli, S. aureus (MIC 10-20), V. parahaemolyticus (MIC 15-20 uM), and P. pastoris (MIC 1.25 uM). Upregulated after V. Parahaemolyticus challenge. Upregulated after V. Parahaemolyticus challenge.
Literature Information.Author: Zhuang ZR, Yang XD, Huang XZ, Gu HX, Wei HY, He YJ, Deng L.2017
Literature Information.Title: Three new piscidins from orange-spotted grouper (Epinephelus coioides): Phylogeny, expression and functional characterization.
